name: 32 oz Wide Mouth with Flex Straw Cap
description: A 32 oz Wide Mouth water bottle with our leakproof Flex Straw Capâ€”easy to fill, easy to drink. Open it up, add your ice, and flip to sip. The insulated stainless steel keeps it cold for up to 24 hours.

name: Reusable Produce Bags - Organic Cotton - Set of 3
description: These reusable cotton produce bags are the perfect alternatives to plastic fruit and veg bags. Made from durable, unbleached organic cotton, these bags will last you a lifetime, rather than a single shopping trip.

name: Bergmont Oil Serum
description: Soothing and Relaxing, Bergamot Oil Serum is a blend of natural oils that are perfect for a relaxing massage. The serum is made from a blend of natural oils, including bergamot, lavender, and chamomile.

name: Stochkholm Skincare & Moisture Hair Oil
description: A blend of natural oils that are perfect for a relaxing massage. The serum is made from a blend of natural oils, including bergamot, lavender, and chamomile.

name: Clove Tonka Oil
description: Clove Tonka Oil is a blend of natural oils that are perfect for a relaxing massage. The serum is made from a blend of natural oils, including clove, tonka bean, and vanilla.

name: Citrus and Cedarwood Oil
description: Citrus and Cedarwood Oil is a blend of natural oils that are perfect for a relaxing massage. The serum is made from a blend of natural oils, including citrus, cedarwood, and lavender.

name: Ouiao Super Serum
description: Ouiao Super Serum is a blend of natural oils that are perfect for a relaxing massage. The serum is made from a blend of natural oils, including bergamot, lavender, and chamomile.

name: Tainyc Polish
description: Tainyc Polish is a blend of natural oils that are perfect for a relaxing massage. The serum is made from a blend of natural oils, including bergamot, lavender, and chamomile.

name: Mezcal Cuba Terry Shirt
description: The Mezcal Cuba terry shirt is jacquard-woven with a cactus motif in midweight cotton terry that sumptuously soft and breathable. Tailored with a resort collar and buttons running down the front.

name: Eldovado Viscose Shirt
description: The Eldovado viscose shirt is an easy-going fit with a resort collar that extends into a buttoned front, patterned with a riot of hand-drawn shapes. Tailored from a breezy viscose fabric characterized by a silky soft feel, ideal for warm-weather lounging.

name: Galbanum Cuba Crochet Shirt
description: The Galbanum Cuba crochet shirt features an abstract take on botanical motifs, brought to life in a heavyweight woven cotton crochet fabric. Tailored with a resort collar and buttons running down the front.

name: Azur Velour Long Sleeve
description: The Azur Velour long sleeve is distinguished by a soft velour-knit fabric in a hue that pays homage to endless summer skies. Style details include a polo collar, chest pocket and buttoned cuffs.

name: Energize Body Cleanser (500mL)
description: Chamomile, Bergamot, Rose

name: Nourishing - Shampoo 0.6-500mL
description: Damask Rose, Black Pepper, Sage

name: Intensive Body Cream (120mL)
description: Rosa Damascena, Acai, Pomegranate

name: Nordic Fireside Scented Candle
description: Smoked Musk Cedarwood and Patchouli.

name: Gradient Candle-Set of 7-Greens
description: An assorted set of seven candles in curated colours, all carefully chosen for their ability to work equally well in a group or stand individually. The candles are Nordic Swan Ecolabel certified.

name: Prayer Plant & Pot
description: Prayer Plant - Maranta Leuconeura. Sold with a stylish ceramic plant pot, this distinctive plant has stunning green leaves with red veins and pink undersides.

name: Peace Lily
description: Peace Lily - Spathiphyllum wallisi. This is recognised as one of the best plants for improving air quality, removing toxins such as formaldehyde, ammonia and carbon monoxide from the air.

name: Fiddle-Leaf Fig
description: Ficus Lyrata. Enjoy the beauty of the classic Fiddle Leaf Fig. The fiddle-shaped leaves of this houseplant are well-loved, and for good reason - they're gorgeous! Native to the rainforests of western and central Africa, this plant makes a great visual impact with its large green leaves.
